attributes.action: Let kids go to the toilet during lessons
attributes.background: Make teachers let kids go to the toilet during lessons, this is because if a kid needs the toilet and it’s an emergency they need to be allowed to go!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require schools to let children use the toilet at all times in the school day
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731355
